properties.name: Waikoloa Beach Marriott Resort and Spa
properties.description: Posted by Kevinangela  The Waikoloa Beach Marriott Resort & Spa\'s multi-million dollar renovation is close to completion. All Guestrooms are finished with a beautiful new design and now include Marriott\'s New Revive Bedding. Our New Mandara Spa is also open along with our brand new infinity pool. The Porte Cochere entryway and Lobby have been redesigned and feature an indoor garden. In addition, our new Naupaka Ballroom will make it\'s debut on March 31, 2007. Tucked into the sun-splashed Kona Kohala Coast on the Big Island of Hawaii, the beautifully restored Waikoloa Beach Marriott Resort & Spa welcomes guests with the gracious look, style and service of Hawaii\'s rich heritage. With the bounty of land and sea captured in stunning views, it\'s the perfect place for a memorable vacation. Or an unforgettable meeting. An island oasis beyond compare.

properties.name: Bahamas
properties.description: Posted by KevinangelaThough much of the Bahamas has become built-up from its success at attracting American tourists, there are still plenty of places for seclusion. Long walks on beautiful beaches and luxurious hotels make this an ideal honeymoon destination.

properties.name: Barbados
properties.description: Posted by KevinangelaFor the perfect beach holiday, look no further. Water sports galore and draw-dropping scenery combine with great music and delicious food. The Platinum Coast boasts white sand and clear, turquoise waters while the Atlantic coast has a rugged beauty.

properties.name: Cayman Islands
properties.description: Posted by KevinangelaDISCOVER THE GRACE & COLOR OF OUR INTIMATE GRAND CAYMAN EXPERIENCE - WHERE IT IS ALL ABOUT YOU! Our 5 million redesigned resort is filled with Caymanian furnishings in warm hues of sea & sun, sky & sand making it difficult to tell where the hotel ends and the island begins. All 305 rooms are drenched in tropical hues of melon, tangerine & avocado, accented with rich dark woods. La Mer Spa, featuring renowned YonKa therapy, also received a massive expansion to include 4 over-sized treatment rooms and a 2-bed couples suite with Jacuzzi. Each of our 4 restaurants & bars has also been reinvented with new names, decor & cuisine offering guests an array of choices. The addition of a $ quarter million in reef balls has enabled the beach to retain more powder-white sand and attract sea life, providing on-property snorkeling. Our pool area has new decking & the landscaping also received enhancements especially to the lush tropical garden featuring a serene turtle lagoon & walkways with a private seating nook. The Grand Cayman Courtyard by Marriott is located on both sides of the road on one of the widest and most beautiful stretches of Seven Mile Beach on Grand Cayman Island. On this beautiful beach, you will find our Sea grape Cafe, serving lunch, drinks, snacks and other beach needs. Adjacent, is Red Sail Sports, offering water sports rentals, dive instruction, dive trips and sunset cruises. Take a run on 7 Mile Beach or cross to the main building to our fitness center & fresh water pool to keep you at your best. When you get the craving, discover one of the areas nicest restaurants, the Mangrove Grille, offering excellent International fare with a Caribbean influence, for breakfast, lunch or dinner. Other amenities you will have at your disposal are room service, watersports concierge, laundry valet, self-service laundry, gift shop, safe deposit box at front desk, Avis car rental desk, meeting room and business center with print, copy, and fax service

properties.name: JW Marriott Ihilani Resort & Spa at Ko Olina
properties.description: Posted by KevinangelaOn the western shore of O\'ahu, the exclusive JW Marriott Ihilani® Resort and Spa at Ko Olina is the most luxurious and complete resort on the island. Set on one of four white sand lagoons, this private retreat exudes a relaxed Hawaiian elegance that only hints at all that awaits you: an award-winning spa; world-class marina; tennis courts with breathtaking views and a championship golf course. There are pastimes to keep everyone happy: two pools, water sports, sport fishing, even children\'s and teen programs. As our guest, you\'ll discover spacious, superbly appointed guest rooms-most with ocean views-and luxurious marble bathrooms. For notable meetings and events, the JW Marriott offers an impressive 77,964 sq ft of function space, and the largest outdoor covered venue among hotels in O\'ahu: the Pavilion at Ihilani, accommodating up to 2,000 guests.

properties.name: Kauai Marriott Resort & Beach Club
properties.description: Posted by Kevinangela  Renovations of one of our ground floor elevator landing foyers will occur from March 1, 2007 through April 20, 2007. Some noise will occur between the hours of 9am and 5pm. The Kauai Marriott Resort & Beach Club combines the warmest island hospitality with the most idyllic destination. Our resort on Kalapaki Beach offers incredible recreational activities, wonderful culinary choices and Jack Nicklaus-designed championship golf courses. A haven for luxury, we\'re the perfect choice for a romantic Hawaiian vacation, destination wedding or family getaway. Pamper yourself with an oceanside massage and enjoy one of the largest pools in Hawaii. Our rooms, most of which have spectacular views, feature a balcony, in-room safe and air conditioning. Our 5 restaurants will tempt you with Italian, Japanese and International cuisine. For unforgettable moments, dine in a gazebo while enjoying breathtaking views. Our ballroom and outdoor space make a stunning backdrop for weddings.

properties.name: Marriott's Kauai Beach Club
properties.description: Posted by Kevinangela  Sign up now for Specials from Marriott Villa Vacations Request a Free Vacation Ownership Proposal at this resort This idyllic Hawaiian destination is home to rain forests, lava sand beaches, misting waterfalls and Marriott\'s Kaua\'i Beach Club. Designed in the style of a royal Hawaiian estate, this resort stretches along scenic Kalapaki Beach where you can swim in crystal clear waters. Splash in the spectacular 26,000-sq-ft swimming pool & delight in a world of resort amenities.

properties.name: Marriott's Ko Olina Beach Club
properties.description: Posted by Kevinangela  The Hotel is experiencing ongoing construction until January 2009. Const. times 8am-5pm including weekends. No site activities or amenities will be interrupted. The exquisite western shore of Oahu is home to Marriott\'s Ko Olina Beach Club, where waterfalls and fountains welcome your arrival. Only 30 minutes away from Honolulu, this secluded beachfront oasis is nestled within Ko Olina Resort, a lush 642-acre gated community where seven crystal clear lagoons shimmer. Delight in a spectacular lagoon pool, with whirlpool spa and beach pool.

properties.name: Marriott's Maui Ocean Club
properties.description: Posted by KevinangelaConstruction and expansion of the resort from Jan. 1, 06 to Dec. 31, 09. Construction times are 8:00am to 6:00pm including some weekends. No site activities or amenities will be interrupted. Villas may overlook construction site of new tower. Ka\'anapali Beach on one of the world\'s most desirable island destinations, Marriott\'s Maui Ocean Club is an exciting resort that invites you to experience the best of Hawaii.

properties.name: Marriott's Waiohai Beach Club
properties.description: Posted by Kevinangela  More distinctively Hawaiian than any other island, Kaua\'i is the idyllic setting for Marriott\'s Waiohai Beach Club, a magnificent resort surrounded by stunning scenery. Experience the exquisite beauty of the "Garden Isle\'s" valleys, canyons, jagged mountains and towering waterfalls on land and unrivaled snorkeling and diving below the surf. Your resort offers beachfront water sports, a sparkling courtyard pool and beachfront water sports for you to enjoy in this splendid setting.

properties.name: Mauritius
properties.description: Posted by KevinangelaMost famous for its white sands and the crystal clarity of the Ocean lapping its shores, the overwhelming beauty of Mauritius lies also in the majestic mountain ranges, nature reserves and wildlife parks that make the island a paradise for couples.

properties.name: Netherlands Antillies
properties.description: Posted by KevinangelaThe Curacao Marriott Beach Resort & Emerald Casino captures the best of Curacao\'s old-Amsterdam charm and sun-drenched warmth, providing for an unforgettable Caribbean vacation. Our location on Piscadera Bay is just 15min from Hate Int\'l A/P. With 6 oceanfront acres, this luxury Caribbean beach resort offers restful views and lush tropical gardens. The adjacent World Trade Center offers over 27,000 sq ft of space for business and social events. When darkness falls try your luck at the Emerald Casino, which offers a variety of traditional gaming options. Excellent dining is available at the Portofino Restaurant which specializes in local dishes and fresh seafood. Our water sports center rents kayaks and offers snorkeling and diving trips.

properties.name: Renaissance Wailea Beach Resort
properties.description: Posted by Kevinangela  Sparkling white crescent beaches, brilliant sunsets, and some of nature\'s most breathtaking natural wonders create the unforgettable setting for this Renaissance resort. This 345-room deluxe resort is located on more than 15 acres of tropical paradise, on pristine Mokapu Beach. Lush gardens, waterfalls, and a view of the soaring, 10,000-foot-high Mt. Haleakala crater create an exotic landscape at the resort.

properties.name: St. Kitts and Nevis
properties.description: Posted by KevinangelaSt. Kitts Marriott Resort & Royal Beach Casino captures the many moods of one of the most relaxing and romantic Caribbean Islands. This incredible resort offers an unparalleled island vacation experience. Our luxury guest rooms, trimmed with West Indian accents and cutting-edge comforts, are spacious and welcoming. That same Caribbean flavor sets the tone in our 8 restaurants and 3 lounges. For those who enjoy games of chance, the resort offers the 35,000 sq ft Royal Beach Casino. The casino offers many traditional gaming options as well as 3 card poker, Texas Hold \'em, and the new Sports & Race book. The casino is one of the Caribbean\'s largest and most luxurious. Our 15,000 sq ft Emerald Mist Spa, includes men\'s and women\'s saunas, hot and cold tubs, and relaxation lounges that will take you away from the bustle of everyday life. The stunning new oceanfront Marriott\'s St. Kitts Beach Club will offer 2- and 3-bedroom villas with separate living and dining areas, full kitchens and private balconies. The first-class amenities of the adjacent St. Kitts Marriott Resort & The Royal Beach Casino will be yours to enjoy, including luxurious spa services, championship golf, 3 swimming pools, gaming and excellent restaurants. Marriott\'s St. Kitts Beach Club will be perfectly paired with the romance of St. Kitts, an undiscovered island paradise quickly becoming the jewel of the Caribbean.

properties.name: St. Lucias
properties.description: Posted by KevinangelaSt Lucia is one of the world’s most romantic destinations, with a beautiful coastline dotted with isolated beaches and coves it offers the perfect opportunity to escape and relax amongst the coconut trees and rolling surf; all set against a backdrop of the setting Caribbean sun and a perfect ocean skyline.

properties.name: The Turks and Caicos Islands
properties.description: Posted by KevinangelaFor the perfect beach holiday, look no further. Water sports galore and draw-dropping scenery combine with great music and delicious food. The Platinum Coast boasts white sand and clear, turquoise waters while the Atlantic coast has a rugged beauty.

properties.name: Virgin Islands (US)
properties.description: Posted by KevinangelaVoted "Best Resort Hotel and Best Resort with a View" by readers of Caribbean Travel & Life, the Frenchman\'s Reef & Morning Star Marriott Beach Resort in St. Thomas provides guests with an unmatched Caribbean vacation. Casually-sophisticated accommodations overlooking a secluded beach, sweeping vistas of the Caribbean\'s most majestic harbor and an island rich in romantic lore. Our 479 rooms make Frenchman\'s Reef & Morning Star the largest Caribbean resort in the US Virgin Islands. Frenchman\'s Reef Resort offers views of Charlotte Amalie Harbor. Surrounded by Caribbean waters, the resort provides luxury accommodations in an exclusive setting. Enjoy the sites of St. Thomas or simply lounge at the pool. With 11 restaurants and bars; 3 swimming pools, Frenchman\'s promises an unparalleled Caribbean vacation. Tucked along a picturesque hillside overlooking the calm azure waters of Pacquereau Bay, Marriott\'s Frenchman\'s Cove will be a breathtaking complement to the beauty of St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands. Adjacent to Frenchman\'s Reef & Morning Star Marriott Beach Resort this spacious resort will be reminiscent of a quaint village surrounded by a secluded beach with amazing views of the Bay and St. Thomas harbor. Like the nearby historic town of Charlotte Amalie, the overall design reflects the Danish and British architectural influences set admidst a colorful tropical landscape.

properties.name: Waikiki Beach Marriott Resort & Spa
properties.description: Posted by Kevinangela  Retreat to a brilliant tropical playground at the Waikiki Beach Marriott Resort & Spa - situated only steps from world-famous Waikiki Beach and the Pacific Ocean. Spanning 5.2 acres of picturesques beauty and splendor, this spectacular Waikiki Hawaii hotel resort blends the spirit of "Aloha" with an atmosphere that is warm, comfortable, and inviting. Pamper yourself at the divine Spa Olakino Salon -- a rejuvenating oasis massages, facials, and other soothing treatments. Unwind on your own private balcony, as soothing ocean breezes caress you. Or relax poolside with a cool drink in hand. Here, you create your own paradise. Located next to the celebrated Diamond Head Crater -- near a dazzling host of attractions and sights -- our luxurious Waikiki hotel accommodations offer unrivaled service, in a landmark setting.

properties.name: Wailea Beach Marriott Resort & Spa
properties.description: Posted by Kevinangela  The Wailea Beach Marriott Resort & Spa is undergoing a 0 million renovation. All guestrooms & suites have been completely redesigned, and now include Marriott\'s New Revive Bedding & high-speed internet access. Hula Moons Restaurant & Lounge, Mandara Spa and our new Fitness Center proudly showcase their new look. Kumu Bar & Grill and our outdoor pools remain open for guest enjoyment. Renovations of our exterior areas will continue through October 1, 2007. You will be swept away by our spectacular oceanfront location on Maui. Capture the panorama of our oceanfront setting with views of the neighboring islands. At the Wailea Beach Marriott Resort & Spa, we invite you to experience "Maui\'s Warmest Aloha."
